inputs.prompt:
A humanoid lizard man riding a rugged dirt bike across a vast desert under the bright midday sun. 
Golden sand dunes stretch endlessly in the background, heat waves shimmering in the distance. 
The lizard man wears desert-appropriate gear: light tactical armor, goggles, and a scarf fluttering in the wind. 
The dirt bike is dusty, with off-road tires kicking up sand as it speeds forward. 
Dynamic camera angles follow the chase across dunes, creating a sense of speed and intensity. 
Realistic lighting, dramatic motion, and an adventurous cinematic atmosphere.
